attributes.action: introduce entrepreneurship into the national curriculum for all secondary schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our economy is becoming increasingly knowledge driven, with ever more industry & commerce being out-sourced to lower labour-cost territories. It seems paramount that we teach our young people the skills they need to generate enterprise and knowledge-based businesses. 

Many schools teach engineering and science skills, as well as traditional humanities subjects, but fewer teach business studies or entrepreneurship to its students. Even economics has disappeared from the curriculum of many schools. 

Entrepreneurship should teach our young people the basics of the knowledge-based enterprise economy, how to plan, set up & run their own business, basic sales and marketing skills and how to appreciate the commercial realities of the job market.
